Reviews.Title: Great for phone calls.
Reviews.Author: Darko4191
Reviews.Content: Classic Phone.This is the best basic world phone I have seen in the market. Any complaints about reception or call quality is ultimately your location and wireless carrier.I would never take an expensive phone if I was going overseas. This phone is meant for travel, and backup. If you have money to spend on a smartphone then please do so. If you just want to make phone calls then this is your phone.PROs:2 Sim cardsAffordableFlashlightLarge buttonsCons:Please do not complain about the phone not having apps. This is a 30 dollar phone meant for phone calls. Yes it does not compare to android, but it not even in the same category. It is a basic phone with radio, and music playback. Take it for what it is and manage your expectations.Some people

Reviews.Title: Nice phone for basic needs
Reviews.Author: Selma L. Tyler
Reviews.Content: All I needed was a simple unlocked cell phone for my back and forth travels to my home abroad.  I didn't need the internet, gps or anything other than a basic phone. Plus, I can put both my t-mobile and digicell sim cards in the phone and not worry about misplacing one or the other.  I only gave it a four because the phone does not have many ringtone options and you cannot raise or lower the volume of the ring or speaker without navigating into the menu.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap phone, does the job
Reviews.Author: D. Bren
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to use only when traveling abroad as a backpacker, so I could leave my iphone behind and not worry about losing it or getting overcharged by carrier. It works great, I took it through two countries so far, will take it again to South America over the holidays. Small, works well, battery lasts a very long time! Easy to use, seems pretty rugged (dropped a few times, no case but no worries so far), nice flashlight. Used foreign SIM cards in two countries without a problem, so I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Works with tmobile sim
Reviews.Author: Edmund Day
Reviews.Content: great basic cell phone  user guide terrible  back of phone (batt cover) just pops off, no sliding  how to work keylock? anybody?

Reviews.Title: Simply a phone
Reviews.Author: j.l.
Reviews.Content: No frills and unlocked! Reasonable pricing, quick to deliver and fully adquate, for when only a phone is really needed. It holds a nice long charge. It is definitely not a smartphone. Perfect replacement phone for the repeatedly clumsy, forgetful employee that will probably lose, break or drop the phone in a toilet anyway.  Good value- it does what it needs to without excessive investment.

Reviews.Title: NO surprises here...
Reviews.Author: J. C. Collier "jcees"
Reviews.Content: And maybe that's the point.  I dropped my current LG into the drink and gave it last rites and ordered this one.  Big buttons, textured hard plastic shell and room for two SIM cards.  A no fuss phone with a bright screen and decent volume.  I'm sure the camera works but I don't use my phone for that sort of thing.

Reviews.Title: It's really really a 30 buck phone. You pay for what you get.
Reviews.Author: upset_customer
Reviews.Content: These days thirty dollars doesn't buy you much, and that's exactly what this phone gives you. The basic functions are hard to figure out, such as adjusting volume. Otherwise it's OK.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: Kimbo "Kimbo"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for an upcoming trip to Europe. I don't understand the negative reviews. If you want a cheap, functional, handy little phone, this one works just fine. Yes, it comes set up for Spanish speaking users. If you go to a local store to buy a SIM card (required), they can show you how to change the settings so the prompts are in English, or see my directions below. The manual is completely useless, but this is not a very complicated device--really, you can figure it out yourself. I have used these phones a little here without problems, and will post an update after the trip to let you know how they worked in Europe. NOTE: you have to use a tiny precision flat-blade screwdriver, or similar small tool (a coin is too thick and your fingernail will be ruined), to take the back of the phone off (to access battery and SIM cards), and you have to be very careful to really snap the back panel back on ALL AROUND the sides and corners of the back of the phone. It can look like it's on and then you press some more and hear those positive clicks that let you know it wasn't properly attached, but is now. Long battery life, good at holding a charge.Changing the Interface to English:Press the top part of the left hand rocker switch (press the horizontal white line) to select "Menú." Use right side of the large center rocker switch (click the right arrow five times) to move to the second screen of the menu and highlight the picture of a wrench and sprockets. Press the center of the rocker switch to select the "Configuración" menu. Press the bottom of the rocker switch (down arrow) to highlight the 3rd option (green) "Configuración del teléphono." Again press the center of the rocker switch to select this option. Use the down arrow to highlight the 2nd option (blue) "Idioma." Click the center of the switch to select it. Use the up arrow and the center click to choose "English."

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: amabelle penalosa
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves the radio and flashlight. Great for young girl always loosing her phone.Good for the price. Hope it will last

Reviews.Title: Does basic things well- does not lock unless you are on the home screen
Reviews.Author: Stephen Walker
Reviews.Content: Like I said, it does all the basic things you want well, but it lacks pretty much all of the nice little features you might desire. Not any sort of spell check or word completion for texting, no headphone jack, even if you put a sd card in you can't save your text messages there to increase the number the phone can hold, can't get mms messages from iphone at all.It is very reliable though, I have never had it crash of freeze, flashlight is kinda nice I guess, makes and receives calls just fine. Like I said, its a very basic phone, if you want frills, don't get it, if you just want to be able to talk to people and send text messages (even though it can be a pain to type them all out) then this is a decent, cheap phone.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Phone Nerd
Reviews.Content: This phone is very cheap.  But for a backup phone for emergencies it works great and the battery lasts forever

Reviews.Title: Fair product for the price
Reviews.Author: Sheldon Makusec
Reviews.Content: Fairly good product for the price.  Keys exposed so prone to pocket dialing. Middle button is temperamental. Could not get the MP3 Player for find music on the Memory card, but could play individual songs thru File Manager.  Upper-lower case and # entry a pain to use.  Phone has worked fine in China and in USA. Useless manual.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Love it, very nice for the price. Works as described. I have had it for almost a week and have only had to charge it once. I would most definitely recommend this phone to others.

Reviews.Title: Simple things ARE the best!
Reviews.Author: Elmer X. Obere "Elmerhot"
Reviews.Content: Eve it has many functions, the menu is not the easiest to navigate.But I wanted a phone... to make CALLS! And this phone has not one but two slots for sim cards.It has the BEST reception and call quality than any other phone that I've tried.keyboard is big, ringer is loud enough and BATTERY it's a monster that will last forever... ideal for remote areas, backup phone, travels, etc.Best phone to... make phone calls!

Reviews.Title: Basic phone for cheap communication
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for travelling in Scotland.  When we arrived, it was simple and easy to buy a SIM card which provides the phone number.  It's very basic with minimal instructions but we were able to figure it out pretty quickly.  Texting is slow because the dialpad must be used but we used it to contact other friends in Scotland and it was not too cumbersome for the intended function.  I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a phone with bells and whistles that weren't needed for foriegn travel.  I would definitely suggest this product. Whatever provider you obtain a SIM card from, it's a simple process to be in communication economically.

Reviews.Title: Holds a charge for a long time
Reviews.Author: Billy D. Conner
Reviews.Content: Used on a 2 1/2 week trip and did not need to charge it at all. Worked well for an inexpensive phone.

Reviews.Title: ok but not so great
Reviews.Author: kurt
Reviews.Content: the phone is full of features . small and neat. simple and easy to use. but i am giving it 3 stars because the hearing volume is really low.

Reviews.Title: Not sure why I bought it
Reviews.Author: Lynda DeGroot
Reviews.Content: I admit I opted for simple & cheap when I purchased this phone.  It IS a good phone, don't get me wrong, but I've determined it's really not suitable for me because I live on a small ranch and am outside every day for several hours at a time.  After the initial frustration of trying to figure out how to work the phone (because the little booklet with microscopic lettering doesn't really explain the basics), I've found that  I can't put the phone in my pocket because the slightest pressure causes it to dial.  I even bought a hard leather case with a belt clip but that didn't work either!  I think I've got the phone itself pretty much figured out but using it outside is not gonna work.  I'm 65 years old but definitely not "elderly", and I need a phone that I can carry with me outside.  I don't want a smartphone or anything with all those bells & whistles.  I just want something that's simple, easy to use, and has a good antenna for picking up signals in our rural area.  This phone has not dropped a single call yet.  Plus, it's got an incredibly long-lasting battery whereas my old phone had to be recharged every day, even when only used once during the day!  However, I can't carry it outside without "butt-dialing" everyone so I should have ordered a flip-top, which is what I had before.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: collins
Reviews.Content: i liked it it, it was as advertised and it arrived on time.excellent product and will recomend for some one else

Reviews.Title: Great phone for travel.
Reviews.Author: Jackie M "JAM"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my lo-tech husband who is now in Germany using it without any difficulty.  The phone was delivered on time and  easy to set up with the sim card I purchased.  It was also easy to teach my husband how to use it.  He is very pleased with it and plans to keep it on the ready for upcoming trips abroad.

Reviews.Title: Not so good quality
Reviews.Author: Sourav
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. But in this equivalent money we get much better quality phones in India made by Samsung and Micromax. I took this phone as backup when my wife's samsung galaxy screen broke down. Faced problem initially to fit the microsim in this phone, later bought an adapter. The phone is pretty basic and you can use to talk and text only.Pros - Good looking, It Works with any sim without much problem.Low Sound when talking in ear, Hassles in charging battery sometimes it does not detects the charger, need to push hard and works.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and simple.
Reviews.Author: Ohphosho
Reviews.Content: I really liked the phone. It actually had a lot of features some smartphones dont have. I loved the flashlight and the fm radio. The speaker was loud. 2G made call quality bad.

Reviews.Title: BLU Tank Phone
Reviews.Author: Pat Williams "bunny foofoo"
Reviews.Content: This is a simple phone in that you can put phone numbers in and call people which is my major use for it.  It does a lot ofdifferent applications that as yet I am not fully knowledgeable about but also things that I don't need it for.  I was interested in a simple phone and that is why I ordered this one.  It is small (cute), easy to use for what my needs are and has a camera and a flashlight neither of which I have used yet.  It will play FM stations on it for a total of 4 hours though I have not used it for that long.  One of the best things about it is the length of time the battery lasts.  So far it has lasted for 2 weeks without recharging and I have talked on it for at least  2 and 1/2 or more hours and the battery does not show any use. It uses SIM cards to collect your stored information and has slots for 2 of them.  I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend it IF you don't want to use the internet or other applications like that.

Reviews.Title: BLU T190i-RD Tank Unlocked Phone with Quad-Band GSM Phone with 1800 mAh
Reviews.Author: ED
Reviews.Content: We used the BLU T190i-RD Tank Unlocked Phone with Quad-Band GSM Phone with 1800 mAh on our trip to Costa Rica and slipped in a local SIM----we were off to our vacation! Worked like a charm----just wish we had brushed up on our Spanish!

Reviews.Title: Ok for what it is.
Reviews.Author: Dave B.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as an emergency replacement for one that was lost.  It's okay for what it is and is good if you don't want to take your good phone overseas.  The dual sim card capability is a good feature.  The sound quality is not that good, but the battery life is great.  I had to contact the manufacturer with help setting it up, since the phone and manual were in Spanish and I don't read enough Spanish to get it to the English language setup.  They contacted me about 24 hours after I sent an email requesting help.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Derrick
Reviews.Content: A wonderful cheap phone, it does all i need and is strong and the battery life is excellent blu making waves in all classes i tell you

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for a trip to Ireland. Worked perfectly. Only complaint was that there was no "lock" button, so the power button was often inadvertanly pressed when the phone was in my backpack.

Reviews.Title: Surprising  little  phone
Reviews.Author: tj
Reviews.Content: Battery lasts for days. You'll need to get familiar with the user interface, which reminds me of a toy set up however it works. Radio is ok. Light is very useful and it has Bluetooth. Sound quality was pretty good on calls. If you need a backup phone or one you are interested in using while abroad then you've got a winner.

Reviews.Title: Does all it needs to do at a basic level
Reviews.Author: Anthony Prudori
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a phone that I didn't have to worry about damaging or losing for the few times I might need a cell phone with me.Pros:- Cheap & light.- Worked almost out of the box (see Cons below) using a Speakout SIM from 7-11 (with room for one more)Cons:- If you don't understand Spanish, it'll be a bit tricky changing the language to English - English instructions (such as they are - more descriptions than telling you how to do things) suck.- Some of the setting changes are a bit convolutedYou don't get a ton of bells and whistles, but for the very basics, a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Bought to use out of the country
Reviews.Author: Lisa in Michigan "Reader"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these phones to use while on vacation with my family.  They were great. I purchased 2 sim cards when we arrived in the UK and put one in each phone.  We were always able to keep in touch with each other by text and voice.  This was an inexpensive way to be sure we always had a way to communicate while out of the country.

Reviews.Title: Go travel phone
Reviews.Author: morenachica
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone to use when I was going to Europe. It does the job and nice and clear.

Reviews.Title: great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: ever vera
Reviews.Content: for this cheap price this is a great phone has more of what you would expect in a phone this price.

Reviews.Title: Good little phone.
Reviews.Author: Frederick Jay Ford "jaybo"
Reviews.Content: You want a simple to use good battery life little phone, this is it.  It just makes life easier when simple is what you need.

Reviews.Title: What were they thinking?
Reviews.Author: Donald L Keener Jr
Reviews.Content: The most un - intuitive device I have ever owned and I work with computer systems everyday. Everything is buried in layers with no real format. You can't even change call volume without being on an actual call and then once again it's buried 2 layers down. The manual is useless as well as their website. I wanted a simple phone and this is absolutely the opposite. A frustrating experience at best. The only positive is the battery stays charged an incredible amount of time. I would never buy again.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Charles Obendorfer
Reviews.Content: Yes it does work.  It will pick up a signal or network and make the call.  It is cheaply made and has very poor graphics.  The menu system is hard to follow and it is difficult to find different programs which come with the phone.  If you are looking for something which is just a phone and don't want any extras, this may be the one for you.  Just remember, it is a cheap phone in a cheap case but IT WORKS!

Reviews.Title: Basic phone and you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: MRyan
Reviews.Content: Pros:  Cheap priceCons:  Very cheap plastic.  No external volume adjustment and overall poor volume when set on loudest.  Battery in standby only lasts about 2 days before phone shuts down--no warning of low battery or shut down.  Menus are confusing (even for a smartphone user)No, I would not recommend this phone unless you're looking for a throw-a-way.

Reviews.Title: BLU T190i-RD Tank Unlocked Phone with Quad-Band GSM Phone
Reviews.Author: Diane Piehl
Reviews.Content: I like the Phone but there is no instructions to it.I am unable to get the web working on it so far I called the number someone answered and it hung up.I am able to use as a phone and text, has flash light called the torch ,radio,camerafor the price it is a nice little phone.

Reviews.Title: WHAT DO YOU DO WHEN YOUR GALAXY SIII STOPS OPERATING?
Reviews.Author: Phil Radcliffe "PHILRAD"
Reviews.Content: I COULD EVEN SLIDE A MICRO  SIM CARD  INTO THIS PHONE, FIDGET WITH IT AND FIT IT TO THE REGULAR SIM PLATE.A GREAT PHONE FOR $25 BUICKS

Reviews.Title: Nice disposable or temp phone
Reviews.Author: Big Bri
Reviews.Content: 4 stars mostly because of the price.  I couldn't find a new unlocked phone that compared in price so it seems BLU doesn't have a whole lot of competition.  I've only had it one day, but so far it's fine.  I'm using it to temporarily replace my Nexus which I dropped.  Best thing with this phone.  If I drop it, I don't give a crap! It's 25 bucks.So, it's like a plastic toy phone.  The screen and texting is like going back to the stone ages of cell phones as expected.  It has a crappy radio, mp3 player, calendar, "torch", non-existent "social networking", video player, tiny camera with 10k of space to store pictures (unless you can afford one of dem sd cards).  Maybe it would make a good Obama phone.  Get rid of the useless features and sell it for $5 cheaper for people like me who just want a disposable phone?It does have ringer profiles.  So while you can't easily adjust the ringer volume, you can switch to the customizable meeting mode with one key press.

Reviews.Title: I need help
Reviews.Author: dar m.
Reviews.Content: Wish someone would call me and help me to figure out how to use the camera, and ALSO how to add names to my phone book in the phone....I just need to know where to go in the phone to complete these functions.  Can I get a phone number from BREED.  dar 630 776 4470

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: C.O.
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived quickly, but it was completely in Spanish. The sorry excuse for a manual did not explain how to switch the language to English. In fact, it didn't explain much at all. So it took me two full days of experimenting with buttons to finally find the language setting. Once I got the phone into English, I couldn't find anything! And did I mention how bad the manual is? It didn't explain anything. I wanted to use the camera, but every time it clicked on the button it said the phone didn't support that function. I couldn't hear people during calls, and there are no shortcut keys. After two days, I emailed the company to ask to return it, and I got an email back saying that unless the phone was damaged, they charge a 20% return fee. However, in their email they were quick to say that if I would give them a good review, they would be "lenient" on the fees. Seriously. I ended up filing a complaint and getting the full refund from amazon (thank you amazon). Anybody who tries to bribe people for good reviews doesn't deserve to be selling products. Don't buy this phone unless you are fluent in Spanish and don't care if the phone is cheap and hard to navigate.

Reviews.Title: it is just cheaper.
Reviews.Author: wang,xiajun
Reviews.Content: it is just cheaper. the battery is powerful.its functions are designed for not easy to use, Its software is very difficult to use.

Reviews.Title: Product problems, Company incomplete instructions
Reviews.Author: Earl Carter
Reviews.Content: Very, Very disappointed in this product and the company that sells it! This Company, BLU, doesn't provide a customer with actual operating, key functions diagrams for cell phone operations..  In other words, the so called instructions doesn't tell you what keys are what and what they're supposed to do for the operation of the cell phone.  When I contact the company, their Rep. acted surprised that I wanted a instructional; diagram, that there was not diagram pointing out various key functions!? !!?  The company has no plans to provide said diagrams at this point!!?  Someone from Amazon should have a serious talk with these folks at BLU!  As I've returned the cell phone to the company.  I've told my friends and neighbors to not buy from this company as they're kinda of new and don't have it together, yet. You know at one point, I considered going to a local Faith Healer, Madam Good, a seer, of dubious reputation so she could take a crack at helping me figure out the safe, operation of the cell phone! But then I figured she would need a big looking glass to see, discover the real, real, small, super fine print that passed for cell phone instructions! I know of what I speak as I used my own large looking glass to see what could be seen by a piece of old analog equipment? Alas, I couldn't make out any helpful, clear instructions?  Of course the fun thought entered by stuffy head as I openly wondered if by placing said phone on top of semi-fake Faith Healer, Madam Good's, heaving, very large, thankfully firm bosoms to test the phone signals strength! Those fun plans had to be shelved/dashed as I couldn't come up with the $50.00 per visit fee! So here I sit without a cell phone to be with  me at all times as I go about my daily business travelling the byways of the O.C., Anaheim, So. Cali.. I only wanted something that would work when I needed it the most! A small wish to be sure!

Reviews.Title: cheap phone, no instructions, difficult to set it up
Reviews.Author: MLA
Reviews.Content: obviously, i bought this phone for use outside of the US and the main reason was bc it has Bluetooth and it can be setup with a car. the phone cannot be setup w/o sim card inside.  but it's really difficult, i haven't figured out how to change the time and date, yet.  anyhow, not wasting more time on it, hopefully it will work with whatever prepaid sim cards in Europe.if you want to use it in the US, don't bother, there are cheaper and much, much better prepaid phones at any of our providers, here. it's too much trouble and it's not worth buying this phone.  nobody needs two sim cards here and the operating system is just a nightmare, nothing simple like our phones have.  or, maybe, if you like to be on Mexico time as the phone refuses New York.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM Quad band, Unlocked Dual Sim 850/900/1800/1900
30 Days Standby-By Battery, 16 Hour Talk Time
1.8" LCD Display, Camera, Bluetooth, Facebook, Twitter
Built-in FM Antenna, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: BLU T190i-RD Tank Unlocked Phone with Quad-Band GSM Phone with 1800 mAh Battery, Camera and Bluetooth - US Warranty - Red
